task.summary: fixed package name in manifest xml
new local test activity with pinch and zoom, started with the game hud and added aim button texture and feature
updated grass texture, added HUD elements, fixed cannon texture orientation, set camera bounds and zoom factor limits
assets cleanup, added white flag button, reworked castle class, fixed max value bug in LifeBar class
resized buttons, added player names and status texts to GameHUD, cleaned up Roof, Stone and Wood and set friction values
fixed step physics, reworked physics manager and PhysicalEntity, changed castle block position to center, added autoRemove and cleanup methods to physics
lobby button is disabled till connection is established, code clean up, second castle, Cannon.pointAt returns true if the rotation has been changed and code cleanup stuff...
fixed castle block positions that caused bouncing in the beginning

Added a new approach to synchronize the physics. This seems to work much better but it has a few negative aspects like flying blocks when the cannonball timeout is passed. You can deactivate that approach in GameConfig. I know it's still out of sync, but that was the best I could do for today.
removed debugging hud status and code cleanup

Added a new approach to synchronize the physics. This seems to work much better but it has a few negative aspects like flying blocks when the cannonball timeout is passed. You can deactivate that approach in GameConfig. I know it's still out of sync, but that was the best I could do for today.
